thread.title: 2K Launches Editor's Choice iOS Strategy Bundle with Three Popular Firaxis Titles
thread.title_full: 2K Launches Editor's Choice iOS Strategy Bundle with Three Popular Firaxis Titles

title: 2K Launches Editor's Choice iOS Strategy Bundle with Three Popular Firaxis Titles
text: 2K Launches Editor's Choice iOS Strategy Bundle with Three Popular Firaxis Titles Thursday, 3 September 2015 (14 minutes ago) Well-known publisher and developer 2K has just announced the launch of its first iOS bundle to the App Store with release of the 2K Editors’ Choice Strategy Bundle. iOS players will be pleased to know that 2K's bundle includes three of the most beloved titles from Firaxis Games, all of which are recipients of Apple’s Editors’ Choice Award: Sid Meier’s Civilization Revolution 2, XCOM: Enemy Within and Sid Meier’s Starships. According to 2K, the new strategy bundle is avai...
